Self.Wiki: Global parameters that change according to the Deep Night depth

mapChallengeWeight_Map.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that the map challenge will be the map not being visible.

mapChallengeWeight_Nightlord.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that the map challenge will be the nightlord not being visible.

mapChallengeWeight_None.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that there won't be a map challenge.

cataclysmWeight_1.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that there will be one catacylsm location.

cataclysmWeight_2.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that there will be two catacylsm locations.

cataclysmWeight_3.Wiki: The weighted likelihood that there will be three catacylsm locations.
